scripts.watch: onchange 'addon/**' 'package.json' 'template/**' -e addon/install.rdf -e addon/chrome.manifest -e addon/StudyUtils.jsm -- npm run build -- '{{event}} {{changed}} $(date)'

addon.name: Test Study for Normdandy Opt Out 1
addon.creator: Gregg Lind <glind@mozilla.com>
addon.description: This addon should appear briefly, then uninstall.  This study is part of testing the 'opt-out' study action as part of Mozilla Shield.
